attributes.title: Sooo bad
attributes.review: So first off, it took an entire week to download and when i opened it it crashed and my phone stoped working for the day. I DO NOT RECOMMEND!!!!!

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: worst app ever. i wanted to support my president 🇲🇾🇲🇾🇲🇾 but this app does not do him justice!!! this poorly made app is FAKE NEWS, sometimes AGAINST him himself. the do nothing democrat’s are behind this. this trump app is A SCAM.

attributes.title: Don’t recommend
attributes.review: Terrible formatting and doesn’t provide useful information about the Trump 2020 campaign

attributes.title: I just don’t like him😐
attributes.review: He’s racist and he sex trafficked and thought he could get away with it but he did cuz he’s still the president🙃

attributes.title: Efficiency
attributes.review: Didn’t really like how inefficient this app is due to a medical disorder that makes me cringe when I see inefficient apps so... change it✨

attributes.title: I just can’t
attributes.review: I have many reasons but it hurts to much to state them so I refuse to state why but just know I am a victim of this app and it’s lies and fake promises

attributes.title: lots of bugs
attributes.review: this app keeps crashing my phone, the screen freezes and i cant get out of the app. i’ve tried turning my phone off and on again, the bug won’t go away. clicking on anything makes the app freeze. very bad app.

attributes.title: DONT BANNED TIK TOK!!!! 👁👄👁

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: My phone kept crashing and it just slowed down over all. I hate this app and if u ban tik tok mr. trump u are taking away every teenagers life.

attributes.title: This app is trash.
attributes.review: TERRIBLE UPGRADE, slow, makes my phone crash. this app should be removed and so should our “president”.
